code: import React from'react';import{Timer}from'@aragon/ui';import{dayjs}from'../../utils/date-utils';function TaskDueDate(_ref){var dueDate=_ref.dueDate;var diff=dayjs(dueDate).diff(dayjs().startOf('day'),'day');return React.createElement(Timer,{end:new Date(dueDate),maxUnits:diff===0?3:2});}export default TaskDueDate;
